website_summaries.verdict: The Beats Powerbeats2 is a gym-focused Bluetooth earphone pair with a frequency response that will only appeal to extreme bass fans.
pros: Does not distort even at top volumes
cons: Audio balance is completely shifted to the bass realm, with very little high-mid presence

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful build quality - could have come out of a cracker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones in August 2017 and to begin with they were fabulous. The maximum return date was only one month later but that was not a problem as these are Beats so they will last for years. It is now 2 months after purchase and the volume control on the headphone cable has literally just fallen apart in my hands. Worse still I can’t return them to Amazon despite them being only two months old! I spend a small fortune on Amazon and I am a prime customer - not at all happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ewen McRobie

customer_reviews.title: Product broke, replace and broke again
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement of the original product supplied and returned due to being faulty. I have to report that the second pair have also failed. They will no longer power on.
customer_reviews.author: R H.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing sound and build quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Initial pair didn't last a month, battery couldn't hold charge and would flatten in my bag. Replacement pair lasted longer. I've tried all the ear fittings and none have been perfect. The sound also leaks out badly. Anyway when I got to the gym this morning the control part of the head phones came apart (see pic). So these have been returned for a full refund (no issues with Amazon they have been excellent). I wouldn't buy Beats again. Will try Bose now.
customer_reviews.author: jgreg82

customer_reviews.title: Every time I move my phone the sound cuts out and I've returned to the less nice but totally reliable iphone headphones
customer_reviews.text: These broke after two months. Every time I move my phone the sound cuts out and I've returned to the less nice but totally reliable iphone headphones. My friend has had to return two pairs of Dr. Dre Powerbeats 3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the product as the sound would not synch ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the product as the sound would not synch with video on my iPad, and this despite downloading a firmware upgrade to supposedly fix it. It's a known issue, well publicised on many forums and even on the Apple website. Strange that this fault cannot be overcome when Apple owns Beats! So I returned the Powerbeats for a refund. Despite my disappointment, Amazon did a first class job in accepting my return and refunding the money. So paid less than half the price for Plantronics Backbeats Go2 that work a treat.
customer_reviews.author: ianspire

customer_reviews.title: I only got these as i wanted the red ones and i am no expert in headphones i got these for the gym and they were brilliant - charge lasted well and never had any faults ...
customer_reviews.text: i have these and my partner has the newer ones. I cant see any difference in performance. I only got these as i wanted the red ones and i am no expert in headphones i got these for the gym and they were brilliant - charge lasted well and never had any faults caused by sweat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this but Beats seem to let me down all the time. There was so much unnecessary and complicated packaging that was really frustrating first of all. The actual product itself doesn't feel special at all. The most disappointing aspect of the product is the terribly low volume. Considering these are supposed to be ideal for working out, you want good energy-inspiring volume that really makes your workout music hit hard but this product won't do that for you. Definitely not worthy of the name Power Beats
customer_reviews.author: Sunil

customer_reviews.title: Best earphones I tested
customer_reviews.text: Best earphones I tested. I wanted something for running and wated to get rid of annoying cable. With powerbeats I really cant feel I have earpones inside I can run without worrying that they will fall off like others. They are best for running and really good sound quality. The only thing I didnt like was poor noice cancellation but I can guess they made it for our safety so we can be aware of surroundings.
customer_reviews.author: Grzegorz

customer_reviews.title: Not impress
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting way more from this earphones as Beats is so popular for its fantastic sound quality which by the way on this earphones is OK, not impressive at all. Earphones fit is not best at least from me, they are pretty loose most of the time. I already tried all the earbuds that comes with the product. Battery life is good and fully charge in about 1,5 hrs. Bluetooth connection is reliable. I'm returning them to buy ones that fits better on my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Eloymup

customer_reviews.title: Died less than 12 months after purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones but I purchased 27 July 2015 and it's not even been 1year and the volume control has fell apart so I superglued back together and then then started needing to be left on charge constantly in order to have battery for my 1hour gym session and now they appear to have packed up altogether so I'm not impressed as having to fork out for another pair less than 12 months later and I'm not sure if it's the product or this Amazon seller has a duff batch?!? 😡👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Tash Newton

customer_reviews.title: Last less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound on these headphones and once you select the right size ear buds (through trial and error) they fit well but this is the second pair I'ver had and both have lasted just under a year. For some reason I can't return these to Amazon as I was able to for the first pair. It's a real shame as I like the product but for the price it needs to last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: James M Usher

customer_reviews.title: Great advert as to the practicality of these sports earphones
customer_reviews.text: Great advert as to the practicality of these sports earphones,worked well for a year then just stopped charging and eventually could not even power on,completely dead.Very disappointing and gather having read other reviews this seems a common problem.They've sat on my cupboard all this time,just felt I had to write this review to warn others,better late than never.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: difficult to fit into ear, pain when worn for longer, Bluetooth always disconnects, sounds not the best
customer_reviews.text: After reading a couple of good reviews I thought I'll give these a try. The only positive about these in ear headphones is the looks. I find it impossible to get a good fit with any of the supplied ear tips. I had quite a few in ear phones before and the fit was never a problem. Also after wearing them for longer time they start to hurt my ears. The sound is quite disappointing as well. You need to crank up the volume fully to listen to music on the bus and sound quality is nothing like my Philips over the ear headphones. I am rather disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dr

customer_reviews.title: Exercise ear phones
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic ear phone with the best sound, is very secure fit, and easy controls, I use them for exercise and have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: fai pang

customer_reviews.title: Weaker than iphones chargers cable
customer_reviews.text: They got broke after 6 months, cables just came out and the things to put up and down the volume just gone m.... another thing is if they made for use it with iPhone why I have to charge it with a mini USB cable? I think the product is overrated.... earphones are really delicate and extremely expensive I'm super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with the first pair that would not turn on and charge after a couple of weeks. As apple now own these as you would expect a quick phone call to customer support, a replacement sent and all good. Fantastic sound and would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: I love them, expencive but they are so nice.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them a few years back and they still work properly, the sound is wery good compared to other products, battery life still good, connects to any bluetooth device
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Good but not reliable. Think of cost
customer_reviews.text: Had these for three weeks and they started showing signs of being unreliable. I checked on multiple devices iPhone iPad and running machine at the gym. They played for a while and started cutting out. This is such a shame as the product seemed very promising. But the price I paid with these problems they had to be returned. I wouldn't expect these issues from such a brand. Overall i wouldn't recommend this product. But amazons service was great. Returned and refunded with no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Although I begrudged paying more than £100 for headphones, I do not regret this purchase. No more am I catching my headphones on the treadmill narrowly avoiding treading on my phone! These headphones will make training in the gym much more pleasant as there are no wires to get tangled in. Easy to use, light... The product comes with alternative ear pieces too. I would definitely reccommend
customer_reviews.author: victoriaswain

customer_reviews.title: Get cheaper ones
customer_reviews.text: Not the best get wet and there knackered so beware when you go running have had another pair so have gone through 2 already got the last pair from vex as not paying theses prices. For something you'd assume would take a little water.
customer_reviews.author: boombucket

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Connectivity Is Very Poor
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. I received these yesterday, gave them a full charge last night to test them out today and i've tried them via 2 separate bluetooth devices and the bluetooth connection is simply not stable enough. It constantly cuts out which is kind of fundamental to using wireless headphones. So i am returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: The Lurker

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones for gym - a shame apple have ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones for gym - a shame apple have taken over now they will force their own connector for charging
customer_reviews.author: jagtar khatkar

customer_reviews.title: It's fine. But I think a bit too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: It's fine. But I think a bit too expensive. I have since found similar product , at a price that is a lot cheaper. It works just as fine as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T. A. Ismail

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant design and sound quality. My only negative is that they can be a little temperamental. Sometimes they don't sync with my IPhone 6s. Apart from that a very good product! However, my wife also purchased a pair and the volume casing fell off after only being used 5 times..
customer_reviews.author: C COX

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: Bought these earphones a few months ago for my OH, they worked twice (once after full charge). Since then they will not turn on. The red light comes on as if they are charging and then take it off charge and nothing. Would like advice as to if this is a manufacturing issue? Has anyone else had this problem???????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: All round ok headphones but way overpriced. Very well looked after but have still managed to break numerous times. Don't normally write reviews but felt compelled to as Chinese branded headphones 1/10 the price would have done as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Reidy

customer_reviews.title: poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item in March 2016. The product was perfect for running and ear headphones would not fall off the ear etc. Battery life was excellent, i was charging once every two weeks, giving me around 6 hours battery life. In September 2016, 6 months later, battery life has fallen off the cliff. I now need to charge after every 2 hours use. This is ridiculous considering the amount you pay for the product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arvs

customer_reviews.title: Only for music.
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing, sounds great. But microphone so poor impossibility speaking when you're outside. I bought it for GYM it's perfect choice but only for listen music only
customer_reviews.author: Viktors Krumins

customer_reviews.title: ... these for just over 2 months started off working fine now literally nothing works
customer_reviews.text: Had these for just over 2 months started off working fine now literally nothing works. Don't buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product for a fantastic price. I really recommended you get this as it does the job required. Thanks again :)
customer_reviews.author: SIMPY

customer_reviews.title: Great audio quality and the wireless range for them is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great audio quality and the wireless range for them is superb. The wire around the back is a bit annoying at times and there is a sound leak if someone is really close - apparently intended to ensure runners do not get in car accidents. Other than that, great audio quality and I like these wireless earphones. I would recommend them overall.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Price.
customer_reviews.text: Good Price. Brought these as a replacement for my wifes previous set that she broke and these reconditioned units were spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bird

customer_reviews.title: these are not as comfortable as the black and red ones i used to ...
customer_reviews.text: Do the job as per beats. But strangely enough, these are not as comfortable as the black and red ones i used to own.weird, i know.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Top ear phones
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews (some not so good) I decided to take the plunge. Great quality, great sound although I suppose they could be a little bassier but they suit my needs perfectly. Plus they hold a charge like forever.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Ward

customer_reviews.title: Only 4 months of use :(
customer_reviews.text: Thought these were really good value but only 4 months old and they've stopped charging already. Very disappointing as I now need to buy another set. Definitely won't be Beats again tho, too expensive for only 4 months of use!
customer_reviews.author: Miss J Evans

customer_reviews.title: disappointment
customer_reviews.text: the product worked for 8 months and then started discharging in 2 mins. i guess batterry is gone. for an expensive product, it should last 2-3 years befor going kaput. totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not loud enough and too fiddly to use. First pair didn't charge.
customer_reviews.author: Deepan Khiroya

customer_reviews.title: Buy Bose!
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointing. Very tinny sound even with Bass Boost eq settings in use. Strangely they cut out when turning head! Wish I had stuck with Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! Good sound! Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my motorbike helmet. They fit perfectly in my helmet. I was worried because I have small ears so I thought they wouldn't fit they are very adjustable. The sound quality is very good and you can hear the bass very clrarky. They keep the charge for at least 48 hours. They come in very nice packaging with a nice portable case. They also come with different buds you fit your ear
customer_reviews.author: Toby Beth

customer_reviews.title: Dr beats stopped working !!
customer_reviews.text: My dr beats have just stopped working. Tbey do not charge and keep switching off. Im sure there should be some guarntee on these. Could i send mine back and get a replacement? Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Workout Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, the ear phones have a load of bass and also don't fall out my ears, don't move a lot and hardly no sweat gets on them.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: sound Better..
customer_reviews.text: pointless... honestly they are... had them delivered... didt even turn on... so I ended up getting some other headphones... and they where 1/3 of the price... and from my experience with these beats headphones... sound Better..... all i can say is.. do your homework.. look around the site.. and you will find better items than these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: havent found the best silicon attachments for my ears yet
customer_reviews.text: battery life not as long as i'd hoped ... long flight you're schnickered. havent found the best silicon attachments for my ears yet, but im enjoying not having the wire dangling about getting in the way
customer_reviews.author: damifu

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and battery but I do find the ear supports awkward to get around my ear. You kind of have to lever it in from below and hook it over.
customer_reviews.author: Peter W

customer_reviews.title: A excellent product
customer_reviews.text: A very good product. I use it with my HTC one. The connection is fast, easy and perfect. I use it mostly for jogging and I enjoy the sound and I like the easy handling. It s not cheap, but the money realy worth, because I get what I want. Good always working sound when I do my sport. I m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerhard Spannbauer

customer_reviews.title: Nice present
customer_reviews.text: Well pleased with this item good quality has a number of different sized ear plugs to suit most ears. No cabling to get caught up and charges quickly via the supplied cable. came on time well packaged and good quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: BBJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent head phones
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones but a bit over priced paying for the brand as well as the quality just know that
customer_reviews.author: Connor aimson

customer_reviews.title: Faulty headphones
customer_reviews.text: Anyone know how to go about getting a replacement mine have become faulty after about 3/4 months
customer_reviews.author: M. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Pretty poor and unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Sadly after the return window closed these headphones won’t switch off. Also the cord tends to get stuck behind your neck when working out. Really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Brillant. My son loves these beats and a great price too. Great service
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Too quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great, but I hate that I can never go back to anything less than the quality I get from these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only got them today but WOW UPDATE!!!!!! broken after 4 months absolute rubbish
customer_reviews.text: I never normally review anything on amazon but when I used these I had to change time to about 30-40 mins sound is incredible clear and top quality can't wait to try them in the gym UPDATE after just 4 months they are broken dont buy wste of money
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Barrick

customer_reviews.title: Ears
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 pairs of these before and were fine however the fine ones seem sharper on my ears and have actually been uncomfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit
customer_reviews.text: These do have a good sound but I can't get them to fit snugly in my ears - the housing appears too big. Therefore sound quality is compromised making it tinny. If anyone has any ideas that may help?
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after less than a year!
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were a present for my partner, he loves them. However, they fell apart last week and I cannot find anywhere on the order to get them replaced or fixed - this may mean they don't have a warranty as I bought them less than a year ago? Not impressed, will keep trying to find a way to get a replacement, but they shouldn't break after 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Volume control fell apart within first couple of weeks - thankfully within initial refund window. No problem with Amazon processing this but very poor quality item. There must be better products around, regardless of cost or brand. Very disappointing and I would avoid Beats in future after this.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs K

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, easy to use, comfortable. I miss some noise cancelling, that's the reason for 4 stars only.
customer_reviews.author: Krisztian

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: bluetooth functionality was great!! they could fit a little better in the ear but would still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Coulloupas

customer_reviews.title: Beats Powerbeats2 Wireless In-Ear Headphones
customer_reviews.text: bought as a present for my Son. he loves them and much cheaper than from the apple site
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rwe Ladds

customer_reviews.title: Poor Product reliability
customer_reviews.text: Purchased my first set in November 2015 and now on my 4th set which have now stopped working Love the headphones but product reliability is so poor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Was iffy about buying this because of the negative reviews but they work great so far. I've only had them for around 2 months though.
customer_reviews.author: emily elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great product, sound is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that has not let me down yet - worth every penny and the future for headphones for runners!
customer_reviews.author: WayneC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good stylish ear buds comfy for several hours wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: we

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, great headphones easy to use and charge, good service from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Second hand...stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Got these second hand...thought it was an amazing deal. Stopped working after 2 months and can’t do anything. Would not advise buying anything that isn’t new :(
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a week then one earphone just came unattatched from device very weak just avoid
customer_reviews.author: J.Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t deserve even one star! The voice module have completely came out and Amazon is unable to help and apple have asked for £89.00 as discounted price for a new one! What a rip off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality did not last 2 months
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, sound quality far better than previous Sony Bluetooth earphones, volume good and comfort also good in gym Update rubbish 2 months in no longer charge. Wish Bose had brought theirs out prior to me buying these, waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Mr Russell C Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Please consider my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Poor connection (tested on iPhone 6S Plus & SE), audio stopped when turn my head around gym. Had it returned & refunded!
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality of product is good. Best advantage is easy to use and quality of music. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love them definitely worth the money. Good base easily hook on and stay on and the red is exactly as the image shows
customer_reviews.author: Shaw Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement on my old plug in powerbeats had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great improvement on my old plug in powerbeats had to doodle a bit to figure it out but thats me.
customer_reviews.author: russell davis

customer_reviews.title: Not happy, bought on impulse and made the school boy ...
customer_reviews.text: Not happy, bought on impulse and made the school boy error of thinking that the more expensive would be the latest model....turns out the newest model is actually cheaper, chears Del Boy.....(Amazon)
customer_reviews.author: ketajami

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality. Also very comfortable to wear. Not the cheapest, but they do the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Theaksk

customer_reviews.title: Bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: Son very happy with these great sound quality even if they are bit pricey
customer_reviews.author: sazzy47

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 6 months before breaking. Won't charge up. over priced rubbish will not be buying products from beats again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: These were expensive headphones that don't work. I've had to replace them three times in the past year as each pair have stopped charging. Amazon have now said that I cannot return them so after only a year I can no longer use them, I would expect better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Easy to use, very comfortable, I only wish I brought them earlier. Great battery life also. Not the loudest in the world but that is all explained
customer_reviews.author: Alessio Lo Russo

customer_reviews.title: they are really good when working
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones for running, they are really good when working... I have found that I have to charge them and use straight away as if I don't they will not work... very disappointed as find I have to use my cheap jvc ones more often!
customer_reviews.author: victoria hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months of minimum use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after only 4 months. Attempting to receive a replacement pair from Amazon!!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: sound is good, comfortable, but Bluetooth is so in and out, so had to send back
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality and comfortable fit but as with all Beats electronics, they have broken within 6 months. They are charging but no longer power on as described by hundreds of other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: J JAMES

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: quite good ,it really useful in gym ,good qulity. should be genius ,since it can be regognized by website

customer_reviews.text: They stopped working after they had been used 4 times but doesn't seem that I am able to return them.

customer_reviews.title: Broken after little use...
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this product.. used literally about 10-15 times and has already broke just after return date how convinent? Knew I shouldn't of brought reconditioned lesson learnt!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It would have been better if didn't have to replace the original purchase

customer_reviews.title: These worked fine for two months then stopped working altogether
customer_reviews.text: These worked fine for two months then stopped working altogether. Absolutely not worth the money and would not recommend buying them.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The whole thing was like buying them brand new. I would recommend them and the seller.

customer_reviews.title: Quite pricey (£85) but highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Best I have every glad - Quite pricey (£85) but highly recommended

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: Great at full volume very loud and bass is strong also the outside noise cancellation is near perfect

customer_reviews.text: Love the product, but they are not grey and red, more like grey and salmon (pink)

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth signal can't be faulted
customer_reviews.text: Worried the Bluetooth would be limited, but so far so good. Battery life isn't amazing, but given the size is understandable

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap but good.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of money but excellent quality. Easy connection and seem to be well made.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Protector piece for the connection fell off but apart from that its perfect

customer_reviews.text: Good device after a little while you forget you still have it on especially with the fact that there are no obstructing cables

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use a bit uncomfortable in one ear but ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use a bit uncomfortable in one ear but I think that's my ear shape would defo recommend and they are great for running

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price tag, failed while using in the gym.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my 15 year old grandson & he loves them

customer_reviews.text: Wore them 4 times and they have now broken, always kept in the case they came in. This is the second pair I have had that's done this.
